item.title: Why Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway may be placing another bet in petrochemicals
item.description: Berkshire is in talks to buy Occidental’s chemicals business for $10 billion. A deal would come as a surprise for markets, analysts say.

item.title: Alphabet’s stock just had its best quarter in two decades thanks to AI
